name: Tetsujin 28 Gou
overview: The old-fashioned black-and-white anime version (original version) of Tetsujin 28 will be revived on the WonderSwan monochrome screen! There is no need to explain the story now, but the boy detective Shotaro Kanada manipulates the invincible robot Tetsujin 28 to solve various difficult and mysterious cases. Although the story part progresses as a normal adventure game, it shifts to a command input type battle in the battle scene. During battle, the game requires quick and accurate command input and accurate judgment. And at the end of the game, the iron man's serious secret seems to be revealed...!?
